name: Kombi Prima Tech Adult Socks - Unisex
description: Get happy feet so you can spend more time on the slopes. These Primaloft® ski sock provide comfort and warmth for all-mountain winter activities. Mesh ventilation zones help with moisture management so your feet don't get damp.Primaloft® insulating yarns with merino wool that's certified to be Mulesed-free.Ski boot adapted cushioning on feet and shins.Mesh ventilation for maximum breathability.Movement support on arch and ankle allows the sock to move with you.Flat toe seams won’t irritate or rub.
